author: Nero
install_msg: MakiAlert cog installed. Use `[p]makialert setup` to configure HTTP endpoints for server alerts.
name: MakiAlert
short: HTTP API for server alerts and notifications
description: Provides HTTP endpoints for external services to send alerts, notifications, and status updates to Discord channels. Supports multiple alert levels, authentication, and flexible message formatting.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores server configuration data including API tokens, channel settings, and alert preferences. No personal user data is stored.
